description: Begin asynchronous resource state update for lifecycle changes to the specified image resources.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the Image Builder resource that is updated. The state update might also impact associated resources.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Indicates the lifecycle action to take for this request. status (string) --- Shows the current lifecycle policy action that was applied to an impacted resource.

nested_params.name: status
nested_params.description: Shows the current lifecycle policy action that was applied to an impacted resource.

parameters.name: includeResources
parameters.description: A list of image resources to update state for. amis (boolean) --- Specifies whether the lifecycle action should apply to distributed AMIs snapshots (boolean) --- Specifies whether the lifecycle action should apply to snapshots associated with distributed AMIs. containers (boolean) --- Specifies whether the lifecycle action should apply to distributed containers.

nested_params.name: amis
nested_params.description: Specifies whether the lifecycle action should apply to distributed AMIs.

nested_params.name: snapshots
nested_params.description: Specifies whether the lifecycle action should apply to snapshots associated with distributed AMIs.

nested_params.name: containers
nested_params.description: Specifies whether the lifecycle action should apply to distributed containers.

parameters.name: exclusionRules
parameters.description: Skip action on the image resource and associated resources if specified exclusion rules are met. amis (dict) --- Defines criteria for AMIs that are excluded from lifecycle actions. isPublic (boolean) --- Configures whether public AMIs are excluded from the lifecycle action. regions (list) --- Configures Amazon Web Services Regions that are excluded from the lifecycle action. (string) --- sharedAccounts (list) --- Specifies Amazon Web Services accounts whose resources are excluded from the lifecycle action. (string) --- lastLaunched (dict) --- Specifies configuration details for Image Builder to exclude the most recent resources from lifecycle actions. The integer number of units for the time period. For example 6 (months). Defines the unit of time that the lifecycle policy uses to calculate elapsed time since the last instance launched from the AMI. For example: days, weeks, months, or years. tagMap (dict) --- Lists tags that should be excluded from lifecycle actions for the AMIs that have them. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_params.name: amis
nested_params.description: Defines criteria for AMIs that are excluded from lifecycle actions.

nested_params.name: isPublic
nested_params.description: Configures whether public AMIs are excluded from the lifecycle action.

nested_params.name: regions
nested_params.description: Configures Amazon Web Services Regions that are excluded from the lifecycle action.

nested_params.name: sharedAccounts
nested_params.description: Specifies Amazon Web Services accounts whose resources are excluded from the lifecycle action.

nested_params.name: lastLaunched
nested_params.description: Specifies configuration details for Image Builder to exclude the most recent resources from lifecycle actions.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The integer number of units for the time period. For example 6 (months).

nested_params.name: unit
nested_params.description: Defines the unit of time that the lifecycle policy uses to calculate elapsed time since the last instance launched from the AMI. For example: days, weeks, months, or years.

nested_params.name: tagMap
nested_params.description: Lists tags that should be excluded from lifecycle actions for the AMIs that have them.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier you provide to ensure idempotency of the request. For more information, see Ensuring idempotency in the Amazon EC2 API Reference. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: lifecycleExecutionId
nested_items.description: Identifies the lifecycle runtime instance that started the resource state update.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The requested ARN of the Image Builder resource for the asynchronous update.
